summary:
Experienced geophysicist active in exploration & production. Completed projects ranging from greenfield exploration through production seismology and equity determinations. Always interested in detecting the geological reality behind the seismic picture.

Specialties: Seismic interpretation, time-depth conversion, visualization, rock physics
